original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽21.15. Kilesadukādi, Kusalattika🔽Nakilesaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi         na kilesam na akusalam dhammam paccayā kilesaḥ akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: The defilements, the unwholesome, etc., the triplets on the wholesome🔽With the defilements and the unwholesome as condition there arises a defilement and an unwholesome thought. (In brief.)

With the three roots as condition, the three unwholesome roots. With the three roots as condition, the three unwholesome aggregates. With the three roots as condition, the three unwholesome aggregates and the three unwholesome elements. With the three roots as condition, the three unwholesome aggregates, the three unwholesome elements and the three unwholesome sense-spheres. With the three roots as condition, the three unwholesome aggregates, the three unwholesome elements, the three unwholesome sense-spheres and the unwholesome consciousness element. With the three roots as condition, the three unwholesome aggregates, the three unwholesome elements, the three unwholesome sense-spheres, the unwholesome consciousness element and the unwholesome mind element. With the three roots as condition, the three unwholesome aggregates, the three unwholesome elements, the three unwholesome sense-spheres, the unwholesome consciousness element, the unwholesome mind element and the unwholesome mind-consciousness element. With the three roots as condition, the three unwholesome aggregates, the three unwholesome elements, the three unwholesome sense-spheres, the unwholesome consciousness element, the unwholesome mind element, the unwholesome mind-consciousness element and the unwholesome formations dissociated from the mind. With the three roots as condition, the three unwholesome aggregates, the three unwholesome elements, the three unwholesome sense-spheres, the unwholesome consciousness element, the unwholesome mind element, the unwholesome mind-consciousness element, the unwholesome formations dissociated from the mind and the unwholesome materiality. With the three roots as condition, the three unwholesome aggregates, the three unwholesome elements, the three unwholesome sense-spheres, the unwholesome consciousness element, the unwholesome mind element, the unwholesome mind-consciousness element, the unwholesome formations dissociated from the mind, the unwholesome materiality and the unwholesome earth element. With the three roots as condition, the three unwholesome aggregates, the three unwholesome elements, the three unwholesome sense-spheres, the unwholesome consciousness element, the unwholesome mind element, the unwholesome mind-consciousness element, the unwholesome formations dissociated from the mind, the unwholesome materiality
